title: 51So the propaganda masters get a new powerful tool, the commie indoctrination centers get bailed ou
content:
51 So the propaganda masters get a new powerful tool, the commie indoctrination centers get bailed out, and we get 600k more commie Chinese spies.  What in the fuck kind of bullshit deal is this? posted 5 hours ago by MAG-n-KAG 5 comments award share report block Jeff Carlson @themarketswork • 1d This was negotiated with China as part of the TikTok sale to Larry Ellison on behalf of Israel. Disclose.tv @disclosetv • 2d NOW - Trump says 600,000 Chinese students coming to the U.S. is a pro-MAGA stance because "you would have half the colleges in the United States go out of business... I know what MAGA wants better than anybody else."
